text:
This small patch fixes The $ext setting ins build/install.sh, please apply.
Done against CVS version.

P.S Consider adding OS "Cygwin W9x" and "Cygwin W2k/XP+" to the OS-selection 
drop down menu in this bugzilla.

root@w2kpicasso:/usr/src/cvs-source/httpd-2.0/build# cvs diff -u install.sh 
Index: install.sh
===================================================================
RCS file: /home/cvspublic/httpd-2.0/build/install.sh,v
retrieving revision 1.4
diff -u -IId: -u -r1.4 install.sh
--- install.sh  9 Feb 2004 20:40:47 -0000       1.4
+++ install.sh  24 Jan 2005 08:32:45 -0000
@@ -44,7 +44,10 @@
 stripcmd=""
 rmcmd="$rmprog -f"
 mvcmd="$mvprog"
+
 ext=""
+[ "$OSTYPE" = "cygwin" ] && ext=".exe"
+
 src=""
 dst=""
 while [ "x$1" != "x" ]; do
creator: jari.aalto@cante.net

text:
Created attachment 14077
build/install.sh  $ext=.exe Cygwin fix

This is same patch as in the bug report (Noticed lated that files were
attached after the report was submitted).
creator: jari.aalto@cante.net
